column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The waffle battered chicken stick was my favorite
column2: and I'd definitely get this again (in fact
column3: I had to order a second while we were there)! The inside is actually a chicken sausage which I wasn't expecting
column4: but it was tasty. The waffle batter was so delicious - nice and light
column5: and balanced nicely with the light and sweet maple syrup! This is
